üéØ WAN 2.1 Parameters Guide

üìä Recommended Settings:
‚Ä¢ Steps: 15-30 (higher = better quality)
‚Ä¢ CFG: Start at 6 (lower = more freedom)
‚Ä¢ Duration: Adjust based on VRAM
‚Ä¢ Format: 720p recommended

‚öôÔ∏è Advanced Options:
‚Ä¢ TeaCache: 0.18-0.30 for 720p
‚Ä¢ Speed: Default 8
‚Ä¢ Sampler: euler (don't change if unsure)
‚Ä¢ Scheduler: normal

üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ Image resolution affects quality
‚Ä¢ Longer videos need more VRAM
‚Ä¢ Use descriptive prompts for better results

üîß Custom Nodes Required:

‚úÖ Already Installed:
‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts
‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-KJNodes
‚Ä¢ ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite
‚Ä¢ rgthree-comfy
‚Ä¢ WAS Node Suite

üìÅ File Organization:

All generated files stored in:
ComfyUI/output/WAN/YYYY-MM-DD/

File types:
‚Ä¢ hhmmss_OG_XXXXX: Basic file
‚Ä¢ hhmmss_IN_XXXXX: Interpolated
‚Ä¢ hhmmss_UP_XXXXX: Upscaled
‚Ä¢ hhmmss_LF_XXXXX: Last frame

üé¨ Ready to create videos!

‚ö° Performance Tips:

üöÄ Speed Optimization:
‚Ä¢ Use TeaCache for faster generation
‚Ä¢ Adjust virtual VRAM settings
‚Ä¢ Enable Torch Compile
‚Ä¢ Use appropriate model size

üíæ Memory Management:
‚Ä¢ Monitor VRAM usage
‚Ä¢ Adjust batch sizes
‚Ä¢ Use model offloading
‚Ä¢ Close unused applications

üéØ Quality vs Speed:
‚Ä¢ Higher steps = better quality
‚Ä¢ More VRAM = faster processing
‚Ä¢ Balance based on your hardware

üîç Troubleshooting:

‚ùå Common Issues:
‚Ä¢ Red nodes = missing custom nodes
‚Ä¢ Model errors = wrong file paths
‚Ä¢ Memory errors = too high settings
‚Ä¢ Slow generation = low VRAM

‚úÖ Solutions:
‚Ä¢ Install missing nodes via Manager
‚Ä¢ Check model file locations
‚Ä¢ Reduce batch size/steps
‚Ä¢ Restart ComfyUI after changes
